headline: Las Vegas Sands (LVS) Reports Q4 Earnings: What Key Metrics Have to Say
summary: Although the revenue and EPS for Las Vegas Sands (LVS) give a sense of how its business performed in the quarter ended December 2024, it might be worth considering how some key metrics compare with Wall Street estimates and the year-ago numbers.

headline: Las Vegas Sands misses profit estimates on weakness in Macao business
summary: Casino operator Las Vegas Sands missed analysts' estimates for fourth-quarter profit on Wednesday, hurt by tepid performance of its Macao business. The Las Vegas, Nevada-based company had previously flagged that it was seeing slowing growth in its integrated resorts and casino business at Macao properties, including the Venetian Macao, which contribute a major part to the company's net revenue. "In Macao, the ongoing recovery continued during the quarter, although spend per visitor in the market remains below the levels reached prior to the pandemic," said CEO Robert Goldstein.

headline: Las Vegas Sands (LVS) Lags Q4 Earnings Estimates
summary: Las Vegas Sands (LVS) delivered earnings and revenue surprises of -10% and 1.53%, respectively, for the quarter ended December 2024. Do the numbers hold clues to what lies ahead for the stock?

headline: Las Vegas Sands: Q4 Earnings Snapshot
summary: LAS VEGAS (AP) — Las Vegas Sands Corp. LVS) on Wednesday reported fourth-quarter earnings of $324 million. The Las Vegas-based company said it had net income of 45 cents per share.
